name: LifeSite
0:
”Alexa, ask Life Site what are my life reminders?”
”Alexa, ask Life Site what are my reminders for this week?”
”Alexa, ask Life Site what are my reminders for this month?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life site
Developer Terms of Use
des:
LifeSite is your family’s virtual safe deposit box. Built for any stage of life, LifeSite protects your most important information - everything you need in an emergency and in life.

Once you create a LifeSite account, you can retrieve the personal and medical information you entered hands-free with the LifeSite skill.

Ask Alexa to check in with LifeSite daily for your Life Reminders, like expiration dates or the date of your next important appointments.

Keep your family’s information safe, secure, and accessible at all times with the LifeSite Amazon Alexa skill. Sign up for an account now at http://lifesite.co

EXAMPLES
“Alexa, ask LifeSite what are my life reminders?”
“Alexa, ask LifeSite what are my life reminders for the week?”
“Alexa, ask LifeSite what are my life reminders for the month?”

SECURITY
With LifeSite, you never have to choose between convenience and security. LifeSite protects your information with multiple layers of military-grade encryption and continuous system monitoring and backups. Learn more at http://lifesite.co/security

**

This skill does not provide health or medical advice, and is for informational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional health or medical advice, treatment or diagnosis.
We are not a covered entity or business under HIPAA.
